name: Loob
description:
Build in an endless loop!

Although the current phase of the game lacks rogue-like elements, the further developed versions will contain them.

The aimed product will include defending against different waves of enemies in an endless tower defense loop where upgrades will take place between instances.

Caution

This game has been prototyped in a game jam in 48 hours, and will be developed during the upcoming months. You can follow this page for updates and the development logs!

Controls

Here is the list of essential controls.

Build & Destroy: LMB & RMB

Add Wave: R

Mute All: M

Pause: P
